name: The Magician's Sacrifice
description:
A Puzzle Game made using Gamemaker Studio 2.

Please play in fullscreen for the best experience! Audio doesn't work properly for now so please press esc -> 'M' to enable audio, will get it fixed ASAP

Help our magician wake up from his coma!

Made by: Kang Xiong (QA), Chi Hong (Designer), Ina (Designer/Music), Roxanne (Art) and Kenneth (Programming) for NM3216 in NUS, Game Design.
